content.rendered: After endless festive revelry, the snowman feels awful, and memories of the past holidays seem like hazy clouds. Urgently needing help to restore his health, the key to recovery lies in a special elixir – Arctic Ale. However, obtaining it is not so simple. Assist the snowman in collecting as much of this elixir as possible to restore his vitality and clarity of memories about the mysterious holidays.
